sqlMap.select: select count(*) From $orgTableNm$ a where a.idx > #currentSize#
select count(*) From $orgTableNm$ a where a.no > #currentSize#
select count(*) From $orgTableNm$ a where a.sp_idx > #currentSize#
select count(*) From $orgTableNm$ a where a.no > #currentSize#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY deptId DESC) AS rn, TB.* FROM (
SELECT a.cateID as deptId, a.cateName as deptName, a.positionID as positionID, a.recateID as upperDeptId, a.cateDepth as deptDepth FROM designBox_category a where recateId like '1,%' or recateid = '1' and a.cateID > #currentSize# ) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
select count(*) From designBox_category a where recateId like '1,%' or recateid = '1' and a.cateID > #currentSize#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY userIdx asc) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.no as userIdx, a.userID as userId, a.memberType as memberType, a.groupID as groupID, a.admin as admin, a.admission as admission, a.userName as userName, a.nickName as nickName, a.sex as sex, a.email as userEmail, a.postNo as postNo, a.address1 as address1, a.address2 as address2, a.telephone as userPhone, a.mobile as userMobile, a.phone as officePhone, a.job as job, a.birth as userBirthday, a.point as point, a.mailing as mailing, a.newsReceive as newsReceive, a.smsReceive as smsReceive, a.staffPlace as staffPlace, a.staffOffice as staffOffice, a.staffPosition as staffPosition, a.picture as picture, a.work as work, a.loginTime as loginTime, a.regDate as regDate, a.delState as delState, a.dupInfo as dupInfo, a.cyberstatus as cyberstatus, a.mgroup as mgroup, a.ssocheck as ssocheck, a.orguserid as orguserid, b.userId as password FROM DESIGNBOX_MEMBER_TB a LEFT JOIN DESIGNBOX_MEMBER b ON a.USERID = b.USERID
where a.no > 0 and a.memberType = 2 or a.memberType = 3 ) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
select count(*) From DESIGNBOX_MEMBER_TB a where a.no > #currentSize# and a.memberType = 2 or a.memberType = 3

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY userIdx asc) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.no as userIdx, a.userID as userId, b.password, '1' as memberType, a.userName as userName, a.sex as sex, a.email as userEmail, a.postNo as postNo, a.address1 as address1, a.address2 as address2, a.telephone as userPhone, a.mobile as userMobile, a.phone as officePhone, a.job as job, a.birth as userBirthday, a.mailing as mailing, a.newsReceive as newsReceive, a.smsReceive as smsReceive, a.staffPlace as staffPlace, a.staffOffice as staffOffice, a.staffPosition as staffPosition, a.picture as picture, a.work as work, a.regDate as regDate, a.delState as delState, a.dupInfo as dupInfo, a.cyberstatus as cyberstatus, a.mgroup as mgroup, a.ssocheck as ssocheck, a.orguserid as orguserid FROM DESIGNBOX_MEMBER_TB a LEFT JOIN DESIGNBOX_MEMBER b ON a.USERID = b.USERID where a.no > 147500 and a.no <= 148500 and a.memberType in (1,9,0) and a.userid not in ('dolgae', 'mookreve', 'amiques', 'test', 'kwww7', 'seokhyun89') ) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
select count(*) From DESIGNBOX_MEMBER_TB a where a.no > 147500 and a.no <= 148500 and a.memberType in (1,9,0) and userid not in ('dolgae', 'mookreve', 'amiques', 'test', 'kwww7', 'seokhyun89')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY regDate) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.telNum as ntcrMobile, a.telNum as option11, a.address1 as ntcrAddr1, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, a.ip as ntcrIp, case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, a.re_name as option2, a.birthDay as option1, a.hopeDay as option3, case when a.status = '3' then '5' when a.status = '4' then '7' when a.status = '1' then '4' when a.status = '0' then '0' else '0' end as replyAt, a.cancelDay as option10 FROM dbo.designBox_board_green_request a where a.no > #currentSize#
) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY regDate) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as option1, a.memo as nttCn, 'Y' as secret, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.homepage as option7, a.telNum as ntcrTel, a.mobile as ntcrMobile, a.address1 as ntcrAddr1, a.address2 as option2, /*업주명 */ a.email as option4, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, a.ip as ntcrIp, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, a.postNo as option6, a.rss_yn as nttSj, '0' as replyAt FROM dbo.designBox_board_sikpum a where a.no > #currentSize#
) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
select count(*) From dbo.bbs_1_table a where a.num > #currentSize# and a.depth = 0

SELECT a.num as nttNo, a.id as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.pwd as password, a.subject as nttSj, a.body as nttCn, a.user_ip as ntcrIp, a.count as inqireCo, a.reg_dt as regDate, a.dong as option1, a.address as ntcrAddr1, a.company as option3, a.bunya as option2 FROM dbo.bbs_1_table a where a.thread = #nttNo# and a.depth > 0 order by a.reg_dt

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY regDate) AS rn, TB.* FROM (
SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, a.ip as ntcrIp, case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, a.telNum as ntcrTel, 'Y' as gubun,
deptId = '30601230000', deptName = '면목본동'
deptId = '30600400000', deptName = '면목2동'
deptId = '30601270000', deptName = '면목제3.8동'

deptId = '30601270000', deptName = '면목제3.8동'

FROM $orgTableNm$ a left JOIN designBox_category b on a.partId = b.cateId where a.no > #currentSize#
) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY regDate) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, CASE WHEN a.use_html = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as htmlYn, a.password, a.ip as ntcrIp, CASE WHEN a.delState = '1' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END as delcode, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, a.category as gubun, a.partID as deptId, b.cateName as deptName FROM $orgTableNm$ a left JOIN designBox_category b on a.partId = b.cateId where a.no > #currentSize# ) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
SELECT count(*) FROM $orgTableNm$ a left JOIN designBox_category b on a.partId = b.cateId where a.no > #currentSize#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY regDate) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, CASE WHEN a.use_html = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as htmlYn, a.password, a.ip as ntcrIp, CASE WHEN a.delState = '1' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END as delcode, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, a.category as gubun, a.partID as deptId, b.cateName as deptName FROM $orgTableNm$ a left JOIN designBox_category b on a.partId = b.cateId where a.no > #currentSize# ) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.name as ntcrNm, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userId as ntcrId, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.telNum as ntcrTel, a.mobile as ntcrMobile, a.ip as ntcrIp, a.hit as inqireCo, a.regDate as regDate, case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, a.father as parnts FROM designBox_board_part_praise1 a where a.father = #nttNo# and a.depth > 0 order by a.regDate

SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.name as ntcrNm, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userId as ntcrId, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.telNum as ntcrTel, a.mobile as ntcrMobile, a.ip as ntcrIp, a.hit as inqireCo, a.regDate as regDate, case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, a.father as parnts FROM designBox_board_part_praise2 a where a.father = #nttNo# and a.depth > 0 order by a.regDate

select a.*, b.cateName as ntcrDept from (SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userId as ntcrId, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.name as ntcrNm, a.regDate as regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, a.ip as ntcrIp, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, a.telephone as ntcrTel, a.handphone as ntcrMobile, a.father as parnts,
replace(a.chargePlace,',','') as reChar FROM $orgTableNm$ a where a.father = #nttNo# and a.depth > 0) a left join dbo.designBox_category b on a.rechar = b.cateId order by a.regDate

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY regDate) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, CASE WHEN a.use_html = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as htmlYn, a.password, a.ip as ntcrIp, CASE WHEN a.delState = '1' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END as delcode, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, a.partID as deptId, a.category as gubun, b.cateName as deptName FROM $orgTableNm$ a left JOIN designBox_category b on a.partId = b.cateId where a.no > #currentSize# ) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY regDate) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, CASE WHEN a.use_html = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as htmlYn, a.password, a.ip as ntcrIp, CASE WHEN a.delState = '1' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END as delcode, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, a.partID as deptId, a.category as gubun, b.cateName as deptName FROM $orgTableNm$ a left JOIN designBox_category b on a.partId = b.cateId where a.no > #currentSize# ) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY frstRegisterPnttm) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.idx as nttNo, a.org_name as gubun, a.org_addr1 as ntcrAddr1, a.org_addr2 as ntcrAddr2, a.org_dept as deptName, a.org_staff as ntcrNm, a.org_tel as ntcrTel, a.bdg_num as nttSj, a.bdg_name as option1, a.bdg_dong as option2, a.bdg_addr1 as option20, a.bdg_addr2 as option21, a.bdg_use as option4, a.bdg_spec as option5, a.bdg_Area as option6, a.bdg_appdate as option7, a.bdg_builddate as option8, a.bdg_roof as option9, a.bdg_repair as option10, a.bdg_repairText as option11, a.bdg_surveyNum as option12, a.bdg_surveyCorp as option13, a.bdg_surveyDate as option14, a.bdg_surveyer1 as option15, a.bdg_surveyer2 as option16, a.bdg_surveyTest1 as option17, a.bdg_surveyTest2 as option18, a.bdg_surveyResult as option19, a.regdate as frstRegisterPnttm, a.moddate as lastUpdusrPnttm, a.ip as ntcrIp FROM $orgTableNm$ a where a.idx > #currentSize# ) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY frstRegisterPnttm) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.b_idx as nttNo, a.sp_idx as sortOrdr, a.sp_num as nttSj, a.sp_getDate as option1, a.sp_getLocation as option2, a.sp_getNum as option3, a.sp_type as option4, a.sp_matter as option5, a.sp_detectNum as option6, a.sp_range as option7, a.sp_area as option8, a.sp_map as option9, a.sp_result as option10, a.sp_method as option11, a.sp_report as option12, a.sp_photo1 as option13, a.sp_photo2 as option14, a.sp_friable as option15, a.sp_condition as option16, a.sp_contain as option17, a.sp_access as option18, a.sp_activity as option19, a.sp_vibration as option20, a.sp_air as option21, a.sp_leak as option22, a.sp_main_type as option23, a.sp_main_freq as option24, a.sp_exposure_man as option25, a.sp_exposure_freq as option26, a.sp_exposure_time as option27, a.sp_warnScore as option28, a.sp_warnLevel as option29, a.sp_manage as option30, a.regdate as frstRegisterPnttm, a.moddate as lastUpdusrPnttm, a.ip as ntcrIp FROM $orgTableNm$ a where a.sp_idx > #currentSize# ) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

select a.* from (SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userId as ntcrId, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.name as ntcrNm, a.regDate as regDate, a.regDate as answerDate, a.hit as inqireCo, a.ip as ntcrIp, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, a.telephone as ntcrTel, a.handphone as ntcrMobile, a.father as parnts, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm FROM $orgTableNm$ a where a.father = #nttNo# and a.depth > 0) a order by a.regDate

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY nttNo) AS rn, TB.* FROM (
SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.company as company, /* nttSj*/ a.owner as owner, /* option1*/ a.company_no as companyNo, /* option1*/
a.date as option7, a.title as nttSj, a.department as deptName, case when a.done = '1' then '1' when a.done = '0' and price1 = 0 then '0' else '4' end as option1, a.price0 as option2, a.price0_1 as option3, case when a.price1 = '0' then null else a.price1 end as option10, case when a.price2 = '0' then null else a.price2 end as option11, case when a.price3 = '0' then null else a.price3 end as option12, a.password as option5, a.contract as option6, a.cancle_sidam as option13 FROM $orgTableNm$ a where a.no > #currentSize#
) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY regDate) AS rn, TB.* FROM (
SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.partID as deptId, a.telNum as ntcrTel, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, a.password, a.ip as ntcrIp, case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, b.cateName as deptName FROM designBox_board_info_recruitnotice a left JOIN designBox_category b on a.partId = b.cateId
Union all
SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.partID as deptId, a.telNum as ntcrTel, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, a.password, a.ip as ntcrIp, case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, b.cateName as deptName FROM dbo.designBox_board_info_recruitpds a left JOIN designBox_category b on a.partId = b.cateId where a.no > #currentSize#
) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY regDate) AS rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.telNum as ntcrTel, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, CASE WHEN a.use_html = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as htmlYn, a.password, a.ip as ntcrIp, CASE WHEN a.delState = '1' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END as delcode, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, a.category as gubun, CASE WHEN a.partID = '174' THEN '30601230000' WHEN a.partID = '175' THEN '30600400000' WHEN a.partID = '176' THEN '30601270000' WHEN a.partID = '177' THEN '30600420000' WHEN a.partID = '178' THEN '30600430000' WHEN a.partID = '180' THEN '30600450000' WHEN a.partID = '182' THEN '30600470000' WHEN a.partID = '183' THEN '30600480000' WHEN a.partID = '184' THEN '30600490000' WHEN a.partID = '185' THEN '30600500000' WHEN a.partID = '187' THEN '30600520000' WHEN a.partID = '188' THEN '30600530000' WHEN a.partID = '189' THEN '30601250000' WHEN a.partID = '191' THEN '30600560000' WHEN a.partID = '192' THEN '30600570000' WHEN a.partID = '193' THEN '30600580000' END as deptId, CASE WHEN b.cateName = '면목본동' THEN '면목본동' WHEN b.cateName = '면목제2동' THEN '면목2동' WHEN b.cateName = '면목제3.8동' THEN '면목제3.8동' WHEN b.cateName = '면목제4동' THEN '면목4동' WHEN b.cateName = '면목제5동' THEN '면목5동' WHEN b.cateName = '면목제7동' THEN '면목7동' WHEN b.cateName = '상봉제1동' THEN '상봉1동' WHEN b.cateName = '상봉제2동' THEN '상봉2동' WHEN b.cateName = '중화제1동' THEN '중화1동' WHEN b.cateName = '중화제2동' THEN '중화2동' WHEN b.cateName = '묵제1동' THEN '묵1동' WHEN b.cateName = '묵제2동' THEN '묵2동' WHEN b.cateName = '망우본동' THEN '망우본동' WHEN b.cateName = '망우제3동' THEN '망우3동' WHEN b.cateName = '신내제1동' THEN '신내1동' WHEN b.cateName = '신내제2동' THEN '신내2동' END as deptName FROM $orgTableNm$ a left JOIN designBox_category b on a.partId = b.cateId where a.no > #currentSize# ) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
select count(subject) from designBox_board_intro_photo where subject = #nttSj#
select subject, file_name1 as fileNm from designBox_board_intro_photo where subject = #nttSj#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY regDate) AS rn, TB.* FROM (
select a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, case when a.secret = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as secret, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, a.password, a.ip as ntcrIp, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, case when a.category = '400' then '일반행정' when a.category = '401' then '민원처리' when a.category = '402' then '문화/체육' when a.category = '403' then '세무/지적' when a.category = '404' then '계약/회계' when a.category = '405' then '청소/환경' when a.category = '406' then '지역경제' when a.category = '407' then '복지분야' when a.category = '408' then '주택/건축' when a.category = '409' then '도시계획' when a.category = '410' then '공원녹지' when a.category = '411' then '교통/주차' when a.category = '412' then '토목/하수' when a.category = '413' then '보건/위생/건강' when a.category = '414' then '기타' end as gubun,
case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, a.postNo as ntcrZipcode, a.addr1 as ntcrAddr1, a.addr2 as ntcrAddr2, a.telephone as ntcrTel, a.handphone as ntcrMobile, a.smsType as smsYn, a.sijak_il as answering_date, case when a.status = '0' then '0' when a.status = '1' then '1' when a.status = '2' then '4' when a.status = '3' then '5' when a.status = '4' then '8' end as replyAt, a.process1 as option11, a.process2 as option12, a.chargePlace as option15, a.chargePerson as option16, a.par as satisfaction FROM $orgTableNm$ a where a.no > #currentSize# and a.father = '0'
) TB ) TB_A WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

select a.* from (SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, case when a.secret = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as secret, a.userID as ntcrId, a.name as ntcrNm, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, a.password, a.ip as ntcrIp, isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name1,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name2,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name3,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name4,'') + '/' + isnull(cast(a.no as varchar) + '_' + a.file_name5,'') as fileNm, a.category as gubun, case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, a.postNo as ntcrZipcode, a.addr1 as ntcrAddr1, a.addr2 as ntcrAddr2, a.telephone as ntcrTel, a.handphone as ntcrMobile, a.smsType as smsYn, a.sijak_il as answering_date, case when a.status = '0' then '0' when a.status = '1' then '1' when a.status = '2' then '4' when a.status = '3' then '5' when a.status = '4' then '8' end as replyAt, a.process1 as option11, a.process2 as option12, a.chargePlace as deptId, a.chargePerson as option16, a.par as satisfaction, a.father as parnts FROM $orgTableNm$ a where a.father = #nttNo# and a.depth > 0) a order by a.regDate

select a.* from ( SELECT a.no as nttNo, a.subject as nttSj, a.memo as nttCn, a.userId as ntcrId, a.email as ntcrEmail, a.name as ntcrNm, a.regDate as regDate, a.hit as inqireCo, a.ip as ntcrIp, case when a.use_html = '1' then 'Y' else 'N' end as htmlYn, case when a.delState = '1' then '0' else '1' end as delcode, a.telNum as ntcrMobile, a.mobile as ntcrTel, a.father as parnssts FROM designBox_board_part_praise1 a where a.father = #nttNo# and a.depth > 0) a order by a.regDate
